name: Spiel (BurningApparatus)
description:
You are trapped in a cave with your only light source being a crack in the ceiling, and a mirror. Use your Mirror to see the area, and kill the creatures that lurk in the cave.  Can you survive long enough to be rescued from your predicament?

CONTROLS:

  • WASD to move
  • Mouse to point the mirror

This game was made for the GameDev.js game jam. The game is written in HTML canvas and typescript. 

All code and art was made during the jam, except for the cave ambience which is from: https://freesound.org/people/LittleRobotSoundFactory/sounds/270387/

Cover art by Gloatingmean4
